title: Kellen's Redemption
description: Outlaw MC President Kellen and debutante/illegal arms dealer Vicki have many challenges to overcome before they can explore their interest in each other, beginning with staying alive. Sparks fly between the two when they meet for a gun deal, but Kellen doesn't know the Russian mob put a price on Vicki's head. He and his Club could end up in the middle of all-out war as paid guns. Kellen has to decide if he likes Vicki well enough to risk his neck by getting involved. Can Vicki trust his help? Or is he another part of the trap her father's old foes have laid? How will she know the difference before it's too late?
author: Aden Lowe
